scripts.start: sls offline & (cd frontend && npm run serve)
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:development"
scripts.deploy:development: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend"
scripts.deploy:production: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend"
